name: uppy
description: Almost as cute as a Puppy :dog:

scripts.build: npm run build:lib && npm run build:umd && npm run build:umd:min && npm run build:css
scripts.watch: nodemon --watch src --ext scss,js -x "npm run build && node website/update.js"
scripts.watch:all: parallelshell "npm run watch" "sleep 1 && npm run web"
scripts.watch:css: nodemon --watch src --ext scss -x "npm run build && node website/update.js"
scripts.watch:js: nodemon --watch src --ext js -x "npm run build && node website/update.js"
scripts.web:deploy: npm run web:install && npm run web:build && ./bin/web-deploy
scripts.web:install: cd website && rm -rf node_modules/hexo-renderer-uppyexamples && npm install
scripts.web: npm run web:install && npm run web:clean && npm run web:build && npm run web:preview
scripts.start: npm run build && npm run web
